Name: Pointless
About the game: Pointless is a game about destroying Dots. Each Dot you destroy adds one point to your score. You can add your score to a global point pool, and see how many Dots have been destroyed globally. Rad! Features Dot destroying action. Five different weapons; Laser, Pulse, Wide, Bomb and Chain. Destroy thousands of Dots! A Global count of all Dots destroyed, using the magic of the internet. Eleven unlockable palettes, destroy Dots to any colour. Alex, they're literally a talking head. Can you find a way to be attached? Character building! An authentic Retro Game Gal aesthetic, right down to that 160*144 pixel screen. Steam Achievements, show off your Dot destroying skills. Steam Trading Cards, you'll have to earn those badges!
